name: Strawberry Apple Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with crisp apples and juicy strawberries, perfect for a light snack or a side dish.
steps: In a medium bowl, combine the diced apple and sliced strawberries.
Drizzle with honey and lemon juice, and toss gently to coat.
Serve immediately or chill for a refreshing treat.

name: Fruit Pop Smoothie
description: A quick, delicious smoothie that combines fresh fruit with a fizzy twist, perfect for breakfast or a midday snack.
steps: In a blender, combine the chopped apple and hulled strawberries.
Add the pop and ice, then blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
